pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains an extensive set of test vectorsto verify the PyCryptodome cryptographic library.PyCryptdome can be installed with either the ``pycryptodome``package (``Crypto`` namespace) orthe ``pycryptodomex`` package (``Cryptodome`` namespace).For more information, see the `homepage`_... _`homepage`: http://www.pycryptodome.org
